ReconfigurableHardware::HwNode::name = node name
ReconfigurableHardware::MPCCNode::host = host node address
ReconfigurableHardware::MPCCNode::numCPUs = number of CPUs
ReconfigurableHardware::MPCCNode::numDFEs = number of DFEs
ReconfigurableHardware::clusters = available hardware machines for hardware execution
